input_text:
Job Title: Junior Software Engineer, AI

Location: United States

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Engineering, Information Technology

Description:
Company Overview

Conveyor is a cutting-edge software company revolutionizing the way vendor security reviews are conducted. By streamlining the process, we make it fast, frictionless, and accurate for both vendors and customers, ensuring a seamless and secure business environment.

Job Description

We are seeking a passionate Junior Software Engineer with a focus on Artificial Intelligence (AI) to join our dynamic team in Palo Alto, CA. This role is ideal for individuals with 0-5 years of experience who are eager to develop innovative AI solutions and contribute to the success of our platform.

Responsibilities

Collaborate with cross-functional teams to design, develop, and implement AI-driven features and improvements. Participate in code reviews and contribute to maintaining high code quality standards. Assist in the research and application of machine learning algorithms and data processing techniques. Contribute to the continuous learning and growth of our AI capabilities. Support the development of scalable and efficient software systems. 

Required Skills

Strong programming skills in one or more languages such as Python, Java, or C++. Understanding of basic machine learning concepts and algorithms. Familiarity with AI frameworks and libraries (e.g., TensorFlow, PyTorch). Ability to work effectively in a team environment and communicate technical concepts clearly. Strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail. 

Qualifications

Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field, or equivalent practical experience. 0-5 years of relevant experience in software development. Experience with AI and machine learning is a plus, but not required. Proven ability to learn new technologies quickly and apply them in practical applications. 

Why Join Conveyor?

At Conveyor, you'll be part of a forward-thinking team that values innovation and collaboration. We offer a supportive environment where you can grow your skills and career while making a tangible impact on the future of vendor security reviews. Join us and help shape the intersection of AI and security!

Experience Level (if available): None

Ability to work effectively in a team environment

Assist in the research and application of machine learning algorithms and data processing techniques
Contribute to the continuous learning and growth of AI capabilities
Support the development of scalable and efficient software systems
output_json.company_information: Conveyor is a cutting-edge software company revolutionizing vendor security review processes.
